text: The Messenger is a quarterly magazine published by the European Southern Observatory (ESO). It provides information about scientific, technical and other developments connected with the ESO. ==See also== * Astronomy and Astrophysics * Atacama Large Millimeter Array * European Extremely Large Telescope * La Silla Observatory * Very Large Telescope ==References== ==External links== * Category:Astronomy magazines Category:English-language magazines Category:European Southern Observatory Category:Magazines published in Germany Category:Quarterly magazines published in Germany Category:Magazines established in 1974 Category:Magazines published in Munich
title: The Messenger (astronomy magazine)
